name: Garden War
description:
Garden War is a tower defense in which you will play a gardener. Your goal is to protect the magic flower from all the bugs that want to eat it.

Plant plants to defend it and then water them to grow them. To save her, you will have to survive for seven waves of bugs.

Will you succeed?

This game has been made in a week (4 days) during a Game Jam organised by l'Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia. The imposed theme of this Game Jam is "Nature".

I created this game in only four days so be indulgent. I created the graphics assets alone.

The game is being developed so your returns are accepted. Garden War lasts approximately five minutes. More content will be added soon ...

Install instructions

1 - Download GardenWAR.zip
2 - Extract the zip file
3 - Execute TodAndCarlos.exe
4 - Enjoy !
